tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces

Interface IAdManager


  • public interface IAdManager
    IAdManager is the IAdContext creator.

    The instance of IAdManager can be retrieved from

      public static IAdManager tv.freewheel.ad.AdManager.getInstance(Context context)
    This method requires an Android Context object (usually the application global context) for the ad manager, and returns the singleton object of IAdManager. Note: All FreeWheel SDK APIs need to be called on main thread.

    AdManager log level could be set via

      public static void tv.freewheel.utils.Logger.setLogLevel(int level)
    Log level could be one of:

    - Logger.VERBOSE
    - Logger.DEBUG
    - Logger.INFO
    - Logger.WARN
    - Logger.ERROR
    - Logger.ASSERT

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setNetwork

        void setNetwork(int networkId)
        Set the network id of the distributor. Note: This method should only be invoked only once.
        Parameters:
        networkId - network id of the distributor

      • setLocation

        void setLocation(android.location.Location location)
        Set the current location of device. This value will be used by AdContext objects created from this AdManager object for geo targeting.
        Parameters:
        location - value of the location to be set. null has no effect

      • newContext

        IAdContext newContext()
        Create a new ad context. An ad context instance is used to set ad request information for a particular ad or ad set.

        Multiple contexts can be created throughout the lifecycle of the FreeWheel AdManager and may exist simultaneously without consequence. Multiple simultaneous contexts are useful to optimize user experience in the network-resource limited environment.

        Returns:
        an IAdContext object

      • newContextWithContext

        IAdContext newContextWithContext(IAdContext originAdContext)
        Create a new context from the original context. The new context copies internal state of the original one for submitting new ad request. Following methods DO NOT NEED to call again on the new context:

        - registerVideoDisplay
        - setActivity
        - setVideoDisplaySize
        - setVideoState

        But the method below is REQUIRED to call again on the new context: - submitRequest
        Parameters:
        originAdContext - refer to an object of original context
        Returns:
        an IAdContext object

      • getVersion

        int getVersion()
        Get the AdManager's version.
        Returns:
        the version String, e.g. 0x02060000 for v2.6

      • newCTSContext

        ICTSAdContext newCTSContext()
        Create a new CTS ad context. A CTS ad context instance is used to submit ad request and fire FreeWheel beacons for CTS SSAI Integration.

        Multiple CTS contexts can be created throughout the lifecycle of an IAdManager instance, and one context is supposed to be created for each stream.

        Returns:
        an ICTSAdContext object
